languages.text: Долгие годы Вольный Торговец одерживал{mf||а} победы и совершал{mf||а} дерзкие экспедиции, усталость и годы были не властны над {mf|ним|ней}. Со временем, впрочем, о {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости поползли темные слухи. Говорили, что у Вольного Торговца завелась мстительная привычка лакомиться плотью тех, кто пытался сделать {mf|его|ее} фигурой в своей игре.

For many years, the Rogue Trader won many victories and undertook daring expeditions. Time and fatigue bore no power over {mf|him|her}. However, with time, dark rumours began to emerge about {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. People said that the Rogue Trader had acquired a vengeful taste for the flesh of those who had tried to make a pawn of {mf|him|her}.
languages.original_text: Долгие годы Вольный Торговец одерживал{mf||а} победы и совершал{mf||а} дерзкие экспедиции, усталость и годы были не властны над {mf|ним|ней}. Со временем, впрочем, о {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости поползли темные слухи. Говорили, что у Вольного Торговца завелась мстительная привычка лакомиться плотью тех, кто пытался сделать {mf|его|ее} фигурой в своей игре.

traits.locale_text: For many years, the Rogue Trader secured many victories and undertook daring expeditions. Time and wear bore no power over {mf|him|her}. With time, though, dark rumours started emerging about {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. People said that the Rogue Trader acquired a vengeful taste for the flesh of those who tried to turn {mf|him|her} into a pawn in someone else's game.

People said that the Rogue Trader acquired a vengeful taste for the flesh of those who tried to make a pawn of {mf|him|her}.

However, with time, dark rumours began to emerge about {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. People said that the Rogue Trader acquired a vengeful taste for the flesh of those who tried to make a pawn of {mf|him|her}.

People said that the Rogue Trader had acquired a vengeful taste for the flesh of those who had tried to make a pawn of {mf|him|her}.

For many years, the Rogue Trader won many victories and undertook daring expeditions. Time and fatigue bore no power over {mf|him|her}. However, with time, dark rumours began to emerge about {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. People said that the Rogue Trader had acquired a vengeful taste for the flesh of those who had tried to make a pawn of {mf|him|her}.

languages.text: 许多年来，行商浪人取得了诸多胜利，完成过许多大胆的探险，哪怕是岁月与肉体的重负也无法对{mf|他|她}造成丝毫影响。然而，随着时间推移，某些关于{mf|他|她}的黑暗传闻逐渐浮现。人们说，这位行商浪人杀掉了那些曾打算操纵{mf|他|她}的人，还吃了他们的肉，作为报复。
languages.original_text: For many years, the Rogue Trader won many victories and undertook daring expeditions. Time and fatigue bore no power over {mf|him|her}. However, with time, dark rumours began to emerge about {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. People said that the Rogue Trader had acquired a vengeful taste for the flesh of those who had tried to make a pawn of {mf|him|her}.

traits.locale_text: 许多年来，行商浪人取得了诸多胜利，完成过许多大胆的探险，哪怕是岁月与肉体的重负也无法对{mf|他|她}造成丝毫影响。然而，随着时间推移，某些关于{mf|他|她}的黑暗传闻逐渐浮现。人们说，这位行商浪人杀掉了那些曾打算操纵{mf|他|她}的人，还吃了他们的肉，作为报复。

languages.text: Viele Jahre lang fuhr {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zahllose Siege ein und unternahm verwegene Expeditionen. Die Zeit und die Erschöpfung hatten keinerlei Macht über {mf|ihn|sie}. Allerdings kamen mit der Zeit düstere Gerüchte über {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} auf. Es hieß, {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} habe eine rachsüchtige Vorliebe für das Fleisch derer entwickelt, die {mf|ihn|sie} zu ihrer Marionette hatten machen wollen.
languages.original_text: For many years, the Rogue Trader won many victories and undertook daring expeditions. Time and fatigue bore no power over {mf|him|her}. However, with time, dark rumours began to emerge about {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. People said that the Rogue Trader had acquired a vengeful taste for the flesh of those who had tried to make a pawn of {mf|him|her}.

traits.locale_text: Viele Jahre lang fuhr {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zahllose Siege ein und unternahm verwegene Expeditionen. Die Zeit und die Erschöpfung hatten keinerlei Macht über {mf|ihn|sie}. Allerdings kamen mit der Zeit düstere Gerüchte über {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} auf. Es hieß, {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} habe eine rachsüchtige Vorliebe für das Fleisch derer entwickelt, die {mf|ihn|sie} zu ihrer Marionette hatten machen wollen.

languages.text: Pendant de nombreuses années, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} remporta de nombreuses victoires et entreprit d'innombrables expéditions. Le passage du temps et la fatigue ne semblaient avoir aucune prise sur {mf|lui|elle}. Au fil des ans, cependant, de sombres rumeurs commencèrent à se propager à son sujet. On racontait que Sa Seigneurie avait développé un goût prononcé pour la chair de ceux qui avaient cherché à {mf|le|la} manipuler.
languages.original_text: For many years, the Rogue Trader won many victories and undertook daring expeditions. Time and fatigue bore no power over {mf|him|her}. However, with time, dark rumours began to emerge about {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. People said that the Rogue Trader had acquired a vengeful taste for the flesh of those who had tried to make a pawn of {mf|him|her}.

traits.locale_text: Pendant de nombreuses années, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} remporta de multiples victoires et entreprit d'innombrables expéditions, sans jamais se départir de son courage. Le passage du temps et la fatigue ne semblaient avoir aucune prise sur {mf|lui|elle}. Au fil des ans, cependant, de sombres rumeurs commencèrent à se propager à son sujet. On racontait que Sa Seigneurie avait développé un goût prononcé pour la chair de ceux qui avaient cherché à {mf|le|la} manipuler.

languages.text: Durante muchos años, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente consiguió muchas victorias y llevó a cabo osadas expediciones. El tiempo y el agotamiento no hicieron mella en {mf|él|ella}, pero, con el tiempo, empezaron a surgir rumores siniestros a su alrededor. Según se contaba, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente había adquirido un gusto vengativo por la carne de quienes habían intentado manipularl{mf|o|a}.
languages.original_text: For many years, the Rogue Trader won many victories and undertook daring expeditions. Time and fatigue bore no power over {mf|him|her}. However, with time, dark rumours began to emerge about {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. People said that the Rogue Trader had acquired a vengeful taste for the flesh of those who had tried to make a pawn of {mf|him|her}.

traits.locale_text: Durante años, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente consiguió muchas victorias y llevó a cabo osadas expediciones. El tiempo y el agotamiento no hicieron mella en {mf|él|ella}, pero, con el tiempo, empezaron a surgir rumores siniestros a su alrededor. Según se contaba, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente había adquirido un gusto vengativo por la carne de quienes habían intentado manipularl{mf|o|a}.

languages.text: 長年にわたり、自由開拓者は幾多の勝利を挙げつつ、大胆な遠征を重ねていった。時が経ち疲労を感じても、{mf|彼|彼女}がそれに屈することはなかった。だが、その統率力にもやがて暗い噂がくすぶるようになる。自由開拓者は自らを輩下に従えようとする者に対し、復讐心を抱き命を狙うようになったという巷説が口々にささやかれていた。
languages.original_text: For many years, the Rogue Trader won many victories and undertook daring expeditions. Time and fatigue bore no power over {mf|him|her}. However, with time, dark rumours began to emerge about {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. People said that the Rogue Trader had acquired a vengeful taste for the flesh of those who had tried to make a pawn of {mf|him|her}.

traits.locale_text: 長年にわたり、自由開拓者は幾多の勝利を挙げつつ、大胆な遠征を重ねていった。時が経ち疲労を感じても、{mf|彼|彼女}がそれに屈することはなかった。だが、その統率力にもやがて暗い噂がくすぶるようになる。自由開拓者は自らを輩下に従えようとする者に対し、復讐心を抱き命を狙うようになったという巷説が口々にささやかれていた。

languages.text: Hür Tacir, yıllar içinde sayısız zafer kazanıp sayısız keşif seferinde cesurca yer aldı. Zaman ve yorgunluk ona etki etmiyordu. Zamanla {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri hakkında karanlık dedikodular peyda olmaya başladı. İnsanlar, Hür Tacir'in onu piyonu yapmaya çalışanlardan intikam alıp onları yediğini söyler oldu.
languages.original_text: For many years, the Rogue Trader won many victories and undertook daring expeditions. Time and fatigue bore no power over {mf|him|her}. However, with time, dark rumours began to emerge about {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. People said that the Rogue Trader had acquired a vengeful taste for the flesh of those who had tried to make a pawn of {mf|him|her}.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir sayısız yıl boyunca sayısız zafer kazandı ve sayısız keşif seferinde cesurca yer aldı. Zaman ve yorgunluk ona etki etmiyordu. Zaman içerisinde {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri hakkında karanlık dedikodular gün yüzüne çıkmaya başladı. İnsanlar Hür Tacir'in, onu piyonu hâline getirmeye çalışanlardan intikam alıp, onları yediğini söylüyordu.
